prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Korean. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Note that the original timestamps should be preserved for each entry.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:00:00,000",
    "end": "00:00:03,360",
    "lang": "ja",
    "text": "私は海岸線を走りました"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:04,258",
    "end": "00:00:05,558",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "And this is what I bought."
  },
  {
    "start": "00:00:06,658",
    "end": "00:00:12,558",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "And two bottles of bean juice and some beef."
  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ko": "Korean text"
  }
]
```

response.ko: 콩 주스 두 병과 일부 소고기도 샀어요.
